articles.description: Carlos Sainz led Ferrari to a 1-2-3 finish on the final day of Formula 1 running for 2022 as Abu Dhabi hosted the traditional post-season test.
articles.content: Following Sunday's season finale, all 10 teams stayed on at the Yas Marina Circuit for Tuesday's nine-hour test day that saw them field two cars each, using one for young drivers and one to help Pire… [+5142 chars]
